description: These Bogs® Classic Mid are the perfect boot to handle anything the day brings. Built with durable rubber to keep you dry and comfortable and to withstand the harshest conditions. Constructed with 7 mm four way stretch Neo-Tech insulation. Comfort rated to -40°F. Contour fit for maximum support and movement and a non-slip outsole to deliver excellent traction on any surface.
name: Bogs Classic Mid - Mens
